nodes.bodyText: As I have more than 10 entries here, I am using Map.ofEntries, hope this is the expected way
If the fields are immutable and not defined in the constructor, please them static as well.
Sorry was my fault, thought Javas final equals c# const. Changed these field to static final.
I would like to add this annotation in another PR to not mess up this PR with non related changes. Adding this annotation would need many changes in other classes, too.
